attributes.action: Keep Affleck's Palace in Manchester Open
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Affleck's Palace in Manchester is due to close shortly if a agreement is not sorted out soon. Affleck is a Manchester icon and has been part of Manchester heratage for years if this place shuts down then Manchester will never be the same.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
